zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·弗拉基米罗维奇·米舒斯京

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物和经济学家，自2020年1月起担任俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Russian politician and economist serving as the Prime Minister of Russia since January 2020.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，现任俄罗斯总统。
description.en: Russian politician, the current President of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，曾任俄罗斯总理和总统。
description.en: Russian politician who previously served as President and Prime Minister of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯经济学家和政治家，曾任联邦税务局局长。
description.en: Russian economist and politician, former head of the Federal Tax Service.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，曾任第一副总理。在米舒斯京感染新冠病毒期间代行总理职责。
description.en: Russian politician, former First Deputy Prime Minister. He served as Acting Prime Minister while Mikhail Mishustin was recovering from COVID-19.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 负责俄罗斯税收的联邦执行机构。
description.en: The federal executive body responsible for taxes in Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦会议的下议院。
description.en: The lower house of the Federal Assembly of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯莫斯科的一所公立技术大学。
description.en: A public technical university in Moscow, Russia.

nodes.id: 国民经济和公共管理学院

zh-cn: 国民经济和公共管理学院
俄罗斯政府国民经济学院
en: Russian Presidential Academy of National Economy and Public Administration

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·普京先后两次提名米哈伊尔·米舒斯京担任俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Vladimir Putin nominated Mikhail Mishustin for the position of Prime Minister on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 自2020年1月16日起担任俄罗斯总理，接替辞职的德米特里·梅德韦杰夫。
description.en: Became the Prime Minister of Russia on January 16, 2020, succeeding the resigned Dmitry Medvedev.

description.zh-cn: 作为俄罗斯总理，米哈伊尔·米舒斯京向总统弗拉基米尔·普京负责。
description.en: As Prime Minister of Russia, Mikhail Mishustin is subordinate to President Vladimir Putin.

description.zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·米舒斯京接替德米特里·梅德韦杰夫出任俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Mikhail Mishustin succeeded Dmitry Medvedev as Prime Minister of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯国家杜马先后两次通过了对米哈伊尔·米舒斯京的总理提名。
description.en: The Russian State Duma approved the nomination of Mikhail Mishustin as Prime Minister on two occasions.

degree.zh-cn: 计算机辅助设计专业；研究生

description.zh-cn: 1989年进入莫斯科机床工具学院（现莫斯科国立技术大学）就读，1992年完成研究生课程。
description.en: Entered the Moscow Machine Tool Institute (now Moscow State Technological University) in 1989 and completed his postgraduate studies in 1992.

relationships.target: 国民经济和公共管理学院

description.zh-cn: 2010年取得俄罗斯政府国民经济学院（现国民经济和公共管理学院）经济学博士学位。
description.en: In 2010, he obtained a Doctor of Economics degree from the Russian Government National Economy Academy (now the Russian Presidential Academy of National Economy and Public Administration).

description.zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·米舒斯京曾在联邦税务局担任副局长级职务，后于2010年至2020年担任局长。
description.en: Mikhail Mishustin served as a Deputy Head at the Federal Tax Service, and later as its Head from 2010 to 2020.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，米哈伊尔·米舒斯京成为公务员，担任联邦税务局局长鲍里斯·费奥多罗夫的助手。
description.en: In 1998, Mikhail Mishustin became a civil servant, serving as an assistant to Boris Fyodorov, the head of the Federal Tax Service.

description.zh-cn: 2008年辞去政府职务后，担任俄罗斯联合金融集团总裁。
description.en: After leaving his government post in 2008, he served as President of UFG Capital Partners.

description.zh-cn: 研究生毕业后，米哈伊尔·米舒斯京领导了国际计算机俱乐部的董事会。
description.en: After graduating from his postgraduate studies, Mikhail Mishustin led the board of the International Computer Club.

position.en: Chairman of the Council of Ministers

description.zh-cn: 在2019冠状病毒病疫情期间，米舒斯京确诊感染，被迫隔离并暂停履职，由第一副总理安德烈·别洛乌索夫代行其职责。
description.en: During the COVID-19 pandemic, Mishustin tested positive for the virus, forcing him to isolate and temporarily step down from his duties, which were assumed by First Deputy Prime Minister Andrey Belousov.

description.zh-cn: 在米哈伊尔·米舒斯京因感染新冠病毒隔离期间，安德烈·别洛乌索夫暂时代行总理职责。
description.en: While Mikhail Mishustin was in quarantine due to a COVID-19 infection, Andrey Belousov temporarily served as Acting Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·米舒斯京接替米哈伊尔·莫克列佐夫出任俄罗斯联邦税务局局长。
description.en: Mikhail Mishustin succeeded Mikhail Mokretsov as the Head of the Federal Tax Service of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·阿拉克洛夫接替米哈伊尔·米舒斯京出任俄罗斯联邦税务局局长。
description.en: Sergei Arakelov succeeded Mikhail Mishustin as the Head of the Federal Tax Service of Russia.
